summary:
This list ranks countries by their Gross Domestic Product (GDP) per person in 2023. GDP per capita is like a snapshot of how much wealth each person in a country has on average. It's often used to compare how well-off different countries are.

The list is divided into categories based on GDP ranges, from over $60,000 to less than $500. However, it's important to note that this doesn't account for the cost of living, which can vary greatly between countries. Exchange rates can also affect these rankings from year to year.
title: List of countries by GDP (nominal) per capita
